Class EnvironmentDetect 

   
    java.lang.Object
   
   
   
    org.codehaus.aspectwerkz.util.EnvironmentDetect
   
  
     public class
     
      EnvironmentDetect
extends Object

Detects Java JVM vendor and Java version Usage: -jvm | -java System.exit code is: 2:BEA, 1:IBM, 0:SUN MajorMinor (f.e. 15) for Java Major.Minor version or 0

Author:
Alexandre Vasseur
